18namespace vsip
19{
20namespace impl
21{
22
23/***********************************************************************
24  Declarations
25***********************************************************************/
26
27///  Explicitely disallow copying instances of classes derived from
28///  Non_copyable.
29class Non_copyable
30{
31  // Constructor and Destructor are protected to emphasize that
32  // Non_copyable should only be used as a base class.
33protected:
34  Non_copyable() {}
35  ~Non_copyable() {}
36private:
37  Non_copyable(Non_copyable const&);
38  Non_copyable const& operator=(Non_copyable const&);
39};
40
41
42
43///  Explicitely disallow assignment to instances of classes derived from
44///  Non_assignable.
45class Non_assignable
46{
47  // Ideally, Constructor and Destructor are protected to emphasize
48  // that Non_assignable should only be used as a base class.  However,
49  // GCC issues '-W -Wall' warnings if classes derived from
50  // Non_assignable do not initialize base class during copy
51  // constructors.  We avoid this warning by not defining using the
52  // default constructor.
53protected:
54  // Non_assignable() {}
55  ~Non_assignable() {}
56private:
57  Non_assignable const& operator=(Non_assignable const&);
58};
59
60} // namespace vsip::impl
61} // namespace vsip
62
63#endif
